lead_paragraph: An airstrike left dozens dead in Idlib Province, as an advance in the divided city of Aleppo left rebels in control of about half the enclave they had taken.

byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad contributed reporting from Beirut, and Karam Shoumali from Istanbul.

headline.print_headline: Syrian Troops Push Deeper Into Aleppo; Strikes Kill Dozens in Idlib Province
headline.main: Syrian Troops Push Deep Into Rebel-Held Parts of Aleppo

snippet: An airstrike left dozens dead in Idlib Province, as an advance in the divided city of Aleppo left rebels in control of about half the enclave they had taken....
